title: Drawing, "Decorative Studies; Verso: Anatomical Studies of Toes", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Five studies of ceilings with grotesques; friezes; four candalabra. Verso: two anatomical studies of toes from behind

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Decorative Studies; Verso: Anatomical Studies of Toes", 1814–18. Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2309.
